item.title: Rising Bukkit SMP Server
item.dc:creator: @dakiller79 dakiller79
item.description:
@dakiller79 wrote:

[quote=“triston001, post:3, topic:446447”][quote author=hat trix link=topic=549320.msg4027193#msg4027193 date=1340431600]
All these plugins ruin a server, in my opinion. I’m not too sure about others, but I personally like a server as vanilla as possible (anti-grief plugins to prevent that problem).
[/quote]
i like a server with interesting plugins, aslong as it doesnt go crazy with them. i like enjoying something new from time to time.[/quote]
Yeah youre probably true I was probably trying to contrast mine with another player’s server so the people on both don’t get bored of both of them, I’ll probably cut some useless ones that nobody is really using out such as magical spells and easy enchant. There are 13 plugins still remaining, which are:
BeHerobrine
Vault
UsefulVillagers
Hugme
Vitals
Death Happens
mcMMO
Essentials group
Dragontravel
Pokeggs (friends request)
and Signshop
Im still unsure about to keep dragontravel and hugme but i will reply after I think about it

Read full topic

item.title: Rising Bukkit SMP Server
item.dc:creator: @triston001 triston001
item.description:
@triston001 wrote:

hat trix:

All these plugins ruin a server, in my opinion. I’m not too sure about others, but I personally like a server as vanilla as possible (anti-grief plugins to prevent that problem).

i like a server with interesting plugins, aslong as it doesnt go crazy with them. i like enjoying something new from time to time.
